code: import React from'react';import classNames from'classnames';import images from'utils/images';const items={melee:{title:'Ближний бой'},handguns:{title:'Пистолеты',gauge:'Малый калибр'},rifles:{title:'Винтовки',gauge:'Крупный калибр'},shotguns:{title:'Дробовики',gauge:'Дробь'}};export default function WeaponsCategories(_ref){let{current,select}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"weapons_categories"},Object.entries(items).map(_ref2=>{let[name,{title,gauge}]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classNames('weapons_categories-item',{active:current===name}),key:name,onClick:()=>select(name)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",{className:"weapons_categories-title"},title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:images.getImage("".concat(name,".svg")),alt:title}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"weapons_categories-gauge"},gauge)));}));}
